sentences.sentence: Old life blown away in the blink of an eye – nothing left but all the time in the world to think about it.
sentences.translation: 一瞬间，过去的一切都离你而去，剩下的只有回忆。

sentences.sentence: In every walk with nature, one receives far more than he seeks.
sentences.translation: 每一次与自然同行，都会有意外的收获。

sentences.sentence: The deepest principle in human nature is the craving to be appreciated.
sentences.translation: 人性中最深刻的本能就是对被欣赏的渴望。

sentences.sentence: I love my liberty too well to be in any hurry to give it up.
sentences.translation: 我很热爱自由，不想就这么仓促地放弃它。

sentences.sentence: At some point, something must have come from nothing.
sentences.translation: 在某个时刻，事物必然从无到有。
